content.raw:
The `INTEGRATION_transporter` test has been failing on osx since pull request #2019 was merged:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/sw_gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/5/testReport/junit/%28root%29/TransporterTest/Transport/

~~~
379: [ RUN      ] TransporterTest.Transport
379: [Msg] Waiting for master.
379: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
379: [Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.2.252
379: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:200] ServerFixture load in 1.2 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
379: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/gazebo7/test/integration/transporter.cc:65: Failure
379: The difference between boxModel->GetWorldPose().pos.x and -100.5 is 100.49999566084728, which exceeds 1e-3, where
379: boxModel->GetWorldPose().pos.x evaluates to -4.3391527198215085e-06,
379: -100.5 evaluates to -100.5, and
379: 1e-3 evaluates to 0.001.
379: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:126] ServerFixture::Unload
379: [  FAILED  ] TransporterTest.Transport (5473 ms)
~~~

@chapulina
